title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. The user is encountering an error message and seeks clarification on its meaning.
OB: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (org.apache.ant), the user receives the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. The user expects to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars within the project.
EB: The user expects the scoped type hierarchy feature to display the class hierarchies of the internal jars within the binary project (org.apache.ant) without encountering the 'No declaration of selected members' error message.
SR:
1. Open a binary project (org.apache.ant).
2. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy.
3. Observe the error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
